headline: Franklin Resources to Expand Alternatives Platform With Apera Acquisition
summary: BEN is set to expand its alternatives platform with a majority stake in Apera, boosting global credit AUM to $87 billion.

headline: BlackRock CEO on Tariffs: ‘We’re Going to See Very Elevated Inflation’
summary: Speaking at Forbes Iconoclast Summit, BlackRock’s CEO Larry Fink said he expected higher inflation if the tariffs are implemented in the coming months.

raw.headline: BlackRock CEO on Tariffs: ‘We’re Going to See Very Elevated Inflation’
raw.summary: Speaking at Forbes Iconoclast Summit, BlackRock’s CEO Larry Fink said he expected higher inflation if the tariffs are implemented in the coming months.

headline: Larry Fink Says Tariffs to Stoke Inflation, Slow Economy in Coming Months
summary: BlackRock Chief Executive Larry Fink expects to feel the impact of tariffs later this year.  The Federal Reserve's favored inflation gauge is now sitting just above the central bank's 2% target, but Fink doesn't expect that to last.  The head of the world's largest investment firm says tariffs could soon cause a double whammy of higher inflation and slower growth.

headline: Goldman Poaches Rivals’ Marketers in Bid to Grow Fund Management Arm
summary: Goldman Sachs  known for its investment bankers and traders, is trying to make a bigger name as a fund manager.  Goldman has laid out targets to generate higher returns and profit margins from its asset and wealth management business, which drove a quarter of the firm’s overall earnings and 30% of revenue last year.  The firm hired Seth Morrison, the former chief marketing officer of financial firm  SEI  as head of marketing for Goldman Sachs Asset Management.
